name: AlRide RideSharing made Simple
description: Rails application for getting a ride share.

ALRIDE_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

ALRIDE_HOST.description: The domain to use to send your emails, this can be the heroku domain for now.

ALRIDE_FROM_EMAIL.description: Email used to send emails out to participants.

ALRIDE_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol to use in linkes in emails. Heroku supports https.

ALRIDE_PORT.description: Port to use in linkes in emails
